descriptionHtml:
I made 5 Dragon recolours which WONT effect the gameplay in any way.
It wont conflict with any other mod expect other Dragon retextures for the STANDART skyrim dragons.That means if you use for example the SkyrimMonsterMod by dogtown1 which adds new dragons it will work, because his new monsters doesnt replace any vanilla ones.
So if you dont downloaded any other Dragon recolours for Skyrim it works to 100%.
I also uploaded a dragonrecolour yesterday (19.4.12) which is IN THIS MOD too .
See it here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15511
Pls leave a comment what you think about this mod and endorse if you like it !
If you have any wiches for a dragon recolour I am going to give my best to make them.
If you dont like some of the Textures but want to use others go to : Skyrim:Data:Textures:actors:dragon and delete the one you dont like and you have vanila texture back :)
author: Regementsee
